stories.title: Basic Player Movement
stories.summary: As a player I want to be able move a player object around the screen so that I can interact with the game

stories.title: Constrain Player to Screen
stories.summary: As a player, I want my player object to be constrained to the limits of the play area, so that I can always see my ship
acceptanceCriteria: Player ship is constrained to screen at the top and bottom
If the player exits the left or right side of the screen, it appears on the opposite side

stories.title: Obstacles Appear
stories.summary: As a player, I want enemies to appear at the top of the screen, so that I have opponents to dodge and shoot
acceptanceCriteria: Obstacles randomly appear at the top of the screen and float downward
Colliding with an Obsticle destroys it
Player Resets to starting location upon collision with obstacle

stories.title: Score Points
stories.summary: As a player, I want to score points when I knock blocks off the screen, so that I have an objective to strive for
acceptanceCriteria: Score a point when obstacles are knocked off the sides or top of the screen
No point is scored if the obstacle exits the bottom of the screen

stories.title: Speed Powerup
stories.summary: As a player, I want a powerup to increase my speed, so that I'm rewarded for playing longer
acceptanceCriteria: Powerups randomly appear on the screen to pickup
Powerups increase the players speed by a configurable amount
